documentation.text: @dev Returns the risk level for the given asset.
@dev Returns the rate of interest collected to be distributed to the protocol reserve.
@dev Returns the beneficiary to receive a portion interest rate for the protocol.
@dev Returns the ratio of which the given token consider for collateral value.
@dev Returns the max amount of collateral to accept globally.
@dev Returns max ltv of collateral / debt to allow a new position.
@dev Returns max ltv of collateral / debt to liquidate a position of the given token.
@dev Returns the bonus incentive reward factor for liquidators.

getCollFactor(address).details: Returns the ratio of which the given token consider for collateral value.

getCollMaxAmount(address).details: Returns the max amount of collateral to accept globally.

getKillBountyRate(address).details: Returns the bonus incentive reward factor for liquidators.

getLiquidationLTV(address).details: Returns max ltv of collateral / debt to liquidate a position of the given token.

getRiskLevel(address).details: Returns the risk level for the given asset.

getSafetyLTV(address).details: Returns max ltv of collateral / debt to allow a new position.

reserveBeneficiary().details: Returns the beneficiary to receive a portion interest rate for the protocol.

reserveRate().details: Returns the rate of interest collected to be distributed to the protocol reserve.
